FOOTER.TEXT: The Polytech Montpellier, as part of a socially responsible and eco-responsible approach, has been carrying out its own carbon assessment since 2011. It is to support this approach that this platform was created, its aim is to collect the carbon emission values of students' international mobility. This project is the initiative of Ã‰ric Anglaret (IR department) and Renaud Metz (DDRS department), both professors at Polytech Montpellier. It was carried out by three IG5 students as part of their final year project.
FOOTER.TITLE: Polytech mobility carbon emission calculator
